thread.title: Jose Mourinho warns Luke Shaw that he must work harder to save his Manchester United career
thread.title_full: Jose Mourinho warns Luke Shaw that he must work harder to save his Manchester United career

author: David McDonnell
title: Jose Mourinho warns Luke Shaw that he must work harder to save his Manchester United career
text:
Jose Mourinho warns Luke Shaw that he must work harder to save his Manchester United career The left-back is in the squad to face Bournemouth but Mourinho wants to see him graft Share Mourinho wants to see Shaw put in the hard yards (Photo: REUTERS) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Luke Shaw has been warned he must work harder to save his Manchester United career. 
Shaw has played just once for United this year, but will be included in the squad for today's lunchtime clash at home to Bournemouth. 
Boss Jose Mourinho reckons Shaw, 21, has the potential to be United's first-choice left-back – but only if he is prepared to put in the hard graft. 
“By age, by physicality, by intensity, aggressive going forward, he should be the best,” said Mourinho. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
